title: Laundry Research
text: This homepage contains information and results from the research conducted by Erik Klint. For the proper cited references, please see Published aritcles

title: Published articles and additional information
text:
This list contains links to all the research and articles published within the current Laundry project. Additional information about the publications can be found here: Chalmers Research
Klint, E., Peters, G. Sharing is caring - the importance of capital goods when assessing environmental impacts from private and shared laundry systems in Sweden. Int J Life Cycle Assess 26, 1085-1099 (2021). https://doi.org/10.1007/s11367-021-01890-5
